teaspoon.app

Class TeaspoonMask

  • java.lang.Object
    • teaspoon.app.TeaspoonMask

  • public class TeaspoonMask
extends java.lang.Object
    TEASPOON: Tools for Evolutionary Analysis of Serially-sampled POpulatiONs Jayna Raghwani, Samir Bhatt, Joe Parker & Oliver G. Pybus University of Oxford, 2010-2018. Key parameters: - estimationBehaviour enum RateEstimationBehaviour one of 'fixed', 'aggregated', 'averaged'. (default: aggregated) - neutral ratio, double - maskValues, boolean[] representing the alignment positions. 'true' to use in the analysis.
    Since:
    13 Jun 2018
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    @lonelyjoeparker

      • getNumberOfValidPositions

        public int getNumberOfValidPositions()
        total number of alignment positions this maks will sample from, e.g. 
         {false,true,true}      = 2
 {true,true,true}       = 3
 {false,false,false}    = 0
        Returns:
        total number of alignment positions this maks will sample from.
